page.title: 12FISHBOURNE FERRY TERMINAL
page.content: The{Fishbourne Car Ferry Terminal has been used by{Sealink Ferries}since 1926.On average,17,200 passengers use the service per Saturday.The peak period for the service is Summer.The vessels,which run to Portsmouth,carry 900 passengers and 142 cars.Around 7 people work in the terminal at any one time,and their job can often be quite frustrating,especially in Summer. The terminal,having originally been built in 1926,was rebuilt in 1972.The port has 2 berths,and 6 lanes(for certain kinds of vehicles)leading to them.The terminal can be reached from Wootton via the A3055 and is situated on a river bank.
